channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 22:37 Air alarm to the Odesa region follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 22:37 Air alarm to the Odesa region follow the following messages.#Odessa_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 18:37 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky district- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 18:37 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky district- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
